creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: gofu background; cartoon-like seated figure, wearing red, white and green garments; yellow ground
markings: 弦七十二品 {Tsuru nanajūni hin} [Seal no. 29]
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Full-length Portraits Series VI "Six Figures of the Stage" 第六期全身図シリーズ・舞台六姿
text: 100th design by Kōkei. Actor Nakamura Senjaku II (b. 1931) as Osome お染 in the play "The Love Suicides at Mount Toribe" (Toribeyama shinjū 鳥辺山心中), performed at the Kabuki Theater in October of 1987. Osome is a seventeen year old prostitute in Kyoto who falls in love with her first customer, Hankurō. The two will eventually commit suicide at Mount Toribe.
title: Actor Nakamura Senjaku II as the Prostitute Osome
